description: Try our easy to follow Slow-Cooked Lamb Shoulder recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow-Cooked Lamb Shoulder Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Using two forks, separate the meat from the bones and remove bones. Spoon the beans and lamb onto plates and top with parsley. Serve with crusty bread. Note: This casserole can also be cooked on the stove top over a low heat for the same amount of time.
